id.description: The unique identifier for the item family.

name.description: The name of the item family.

description.description: A brief description of the item family.

status.description: The status of the item family.

resource_version.description: The resource version of the item family data.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the item family was last updated.

channel.description: The channel associated with the item family.

object.description: The type of object, in this case, 'item_family'.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields specific to the item family.
